review: Love this I have no cable and it does exactly what I need it to do for a busy bee like myself.
author: Stephanie A

review: Good device but user interface could be improved.  Good selection of apps but you have to download them.  Selection of apps is only reason I would select it over Apple TV.
author: DD

review: The Fire TV Stick works great, although I'm a little disappointed with the amount of content that is free through Prime. The Stick itself is awesome. It is fast, super easy to use and set up, and I was able to plug it into my receiver to use my surround sound system. The video and sound quality is great, I would just like more content made available for Prime members.
author: J. Finfrock

review: We were trying to use Google Chromecast and had one problem after another.  Plugged in the Firestick, downloaded Netflix and started watching.  Love it!
author: Shelley Citron

review: The fire stick is amazing and super easy to use!
author: Kindle Customerfffffdd

review: It is very difficult to find anything I don't have to pay for. Not easy to navigate, not so sure what was advertised is what you actually get. Very disappointed
author: Heather Fromme
